original_text: They are the kind who worm their way into homes and gain control over gullible women, who are loaded down with sins and are swayed by all kinds of evil desires,
korean_text: 그들 중에 남의 집에 가만히 들어가 어리석은 여자를 유인하는 자들이 있으니 그 여자는 죄를 중히 지고 여러 가지 욕심에 끌린 바 되어

sentences.original_text: They are the kind who worm their way into homes
and gain control over gullible women
who are loaded down with sins
and are swayed by all kinds of evil desires
